title: Tahm was already toxic champion to most top laner champions and now he toxic to ever champion
body:
That frog {{champion:223}} was cancer to 75% of top laners champions and now after the changes he just have a high winrate against all top laners champions from the weakest to strongest.

Even the champions that doesn't need to interact with him like {{champion:83}} ,{{champion:133}} ,{{champion:67}} and{{champion:420}} still hardly have any winrate against him, So i wonder how long he will be like that without true nerf and i thought he was supposed to be "Support"

One day that balance team will touch champion with change and doesn't make them op, hopefully.

And on side note : I really started to hate top lane where it either play op broken champion or let your team carry your weak champion, legit this season either  abuse champions and b e meta slaves or deal with meta slaves and lose land hard or even game unless your team is super good to carry your useless top laner champion.

replies.body: And this Top Lane cancer is bleeding into the Mid lane too.

>
> And this Top Lane cancer is bleeding into the Mid lane too.

Balance team at it finest, right?
Thank god. Maybe then it finally has a chance to be nerfed

>

They made a very fun character lore wise with very interesting interactions. But since his release something was very wrong about his gameplay.

It’s almost like riot just throws random shit at the wall to see what happens. They are talking about nerfing Irelia AGAIN. This time it’s her base mr. I don’t even play Irelia and I feel bad for her mains. The problem is HEALING, sustain is just took goo right now. Tahm has sustain, Irelia has sustain, aatrox has sustain, urgot has sustain, every fucking champion has some kind of sustain. This would be a problem if there was a counter to it but there isn’t. Play a tank and build thorn main against and aatrox, he will still heal through everything. If sustain is needed then things will be better

Play a tank and build thorn main against and aatrox, he will still heal through everything. If sustain is needed then things will be better

Wait what. 
Why would anyone nerf irelias MR!?

Irelia needs her passive nerfed considerably for the early game she legit rightclicks pretty much every toplaner to death except jax. 
What the actual fuck. 

Ah yeah riot doesn't give a fuck about toplane they just want her gone from midlane so mage players stop complaining and toplaners can go eat a dick.
As a Vayne main I disagree. He is not toxic to us.

well let me tell you something ; i lost a 1V1 as nasus vs him while stacking 450 and while i'm lvl 14 and he is 12 and you know what is good  ? he was support and what better ? 
 he lived with 1000H P what means i had 0 chance actually XD ( not even clse ) 
and when i play nasus toplane and its vs a tahm kench i 99% of time rage quit the game ; because if i dont i will probably get an intentional feeding repport since he can dive me whenever he want and since that playing vs that champ make me super frustrated to a point where i will probably flame and int so in prefear a leaver then a chat rest or account suspension , ( this is how fun it is to play vs tahm kench , a champ who auto win every mele match up  )

I mean i do play urgot so unless im 2 items and level 11 i will be killed over and over
the only time i played vs a tahm kench in lane and i did not fed ; i was actually palying veigar perma slow build XD ( and was afk farm and only use my cc to escape )

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Mechanics,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JlJbQemw,comment-id=000c00000000,timestamp=2019-06-05T21:23:53.405+0000)

Rip
He does the same bullshit darius does. Hits you with one ability so you either die or lose half your hp. Both of those champions can eat one.

> [{quoted}](name=I Play This Game,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JlJbQemw,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2019-06-05T14:02:47.229+0000)
>
> He does the same bullshit darius does. Hits you with one ability so you either die or lose half your hp. Both of those champions can eat one.

No sir atleast Daruis can be played around and he isn't that amazing in every matchup.

> [{quoted}](name=ValiantKiller,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JlJbQemw,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2019-06-05T14:11:19.761+0000)
>
> No sir atleast Daruis can be played around and he isn't that amazing in every matchup.

According to u.gg and league of graphs they both have a roughly equal amount of winning, losing and even match-ups. The only reason tahm has a higher win rate and is percieved to be harder to lane against is because tahm counters more common champions than darius does. This means you are more likely to be countered picked vs a tahm than vs a darius. 

HOWEVER, performance is irrelevant to my point. I talked about their kit not their matchups. Their kit is, if you land one of your abilities you are doing half their hp. That's why darius has always been a new player friendly champion because Iron-Gold players are more likely to get pulled by E which gives even new darius the oppourtunity to either force them to back or just take ghost and kill them.

> [{quoted}](name=I Play This Game,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JlJbQemw,comment-id=000b00000000,timestamp=2019-06-05T14:45:54.066+0000)
>

The only reason tahm has a higher win rate and is percieved to be harder to lane against is because tahm counters more common champions than darius does. This means you are more likely to be countered picked vs a tahm than vs a darius. 
> 
> HOWEVER, performance is irrelevant to my point. I talked about their kit not their matchups. Their kit is, if you land one of your abilities you are doing half their hp. That's why darius has always been a new player friendly champion because Iron-Gold players are more likely to get pulled by E which gives even new darius the oppourtunity to either force them to back or just take ghost and kill them.

I ageee in that but unlike tahm , he need to abuse ghost or ignite to run you down and unlike tahm he isn't tanky monster.
And in long term illaoi, yorick, et can bully daruis but ohh god tahm nothing even vayne can stop against him
I only made him my main because of the hat. The rest I didn't care about.

> [{quoted}](name=i piss in jugs,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JlJbQemw,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-06-05T03:35:47.706+0000)
>
> I only made him my main because of the hat. The rest I didn't care about.

I believe you
54% wr top in NA plat+, balanced champ btw

Main issue with tahm is he's effective against melee, but has huge weaknesses toward kiting, the two you mentioned should always win vs. tahm 

another thing is tahm like all tanks have some form of mitigation, in this case it's his E. so taking a gigantic trade is a bad idea unless its a straight all in, which you'll likely lose.

The key to beating him is chipping at his health, and denying him lvl 1-2 where he won't have a point in E for sustain.

What's his playrate like? Still garbage/low? More than likely.

Going by winrate without adding in playrate is worthless. He was a bad top laner before changes and yet still had a good winrate despite this thanks to a low pickrate.

> [{quoted}](name=MorgManBasher,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JlJbQemw,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2019-06-05T19:07:10.260+0000)

> 
> Going by winrate without adding in playrate is worthless. He was a bad top laner before changes and yet still had a good winrate despite this thanks to a low pickrate.

The same as {{champion:86}} and {{champion:85}} 4 times the amount of {{champion:57}} and {{champion:62}} 
That now low, that is decent.

Thankfully I decided to main Ashe on my smurf while helping a friend get into plat so that catfish gets kited into oblivion whenever he gets picked. Still,  whoever thought buffing TOP KENCH was a good idea should get forced to play vs it for 50 games straight as the top laner.

Still you is the adc, imagine being top laner main who legit for over 10 patch got to deal with meta slave abusers in lane either as hercaim or vayne or riven or aatrox or renekton or tahm now and then there mordkersiar on the horizon.
Legit this season top lane is toxic breeding ground for champions.
Glad i stopped ranking

He's beyond broken top lane and needs a nerf. Shield runes benefit him so hard. Insta-ban or pick in my opinion. Tanking tower 20 tower shots at 20 minutes in a row while doing damage of a mid laner?
